thread.title: TopatoCon weekend through the Tweets of attendees
thread.title_full: TopatoCon weekend through the Tweets of attendees

author: Heather Adams | Hadams@masslive.com
title: TopatoCon weekend through the Tweets of attendees
text:
Comments 
TopatoCon, an indie culture convention was held at Eastworks on September 26 and 27. The event was organized by Easthampton-based business TopatoCo. 
It featured two days of panels based on internet and indie culture. Creators of webcomics, podcasts and other media set up booths, too. 
In case you missed the event, attendees took to Twitter to let you know what went on.
